OUR FOCUS

energy saving stoves manufacture and installation,trainings in kitchen designing and environmental conservation

OUR SERVICES

Energy saving stoves installation, Training energy saving stove builders, Training on environmental mitigation, Supply of energy saving stoves, Kitchen designing, Supplying firewood, Tile laying,

Mission Save Earth

In a nutshell, most activities that have put Earth at threat include Dangers of deforestation which are evident in Uganda through pit sewing, bush burning and massive cutting down of trees. we can eaily conserve the enviroment though using available rescources in good ways and reduncing cutting down of trees to provide for energy sources by using modern wasy of providng energy sources

LIFE AT KESSO

As we intend to generate income and Conserve the environment using Energy Saving Stoves, Well this can be achieved through our different activities and programs
We continue with making of charcoal and energy saving stoves and we will be fully involved in manufacturing and sale of steel products
Construction of all sorts of buildings and importation and exportation of fabrics, Making and selling garments and decorations

Energy saving stoves installation and training energy saving stove builders Training on environmental mitigation and supply of energy saving stoves Kitchen designing, Supplying firewood, Tile laying

Mission Income Generation

Currently people are spending much on ways of fuel for cooking such elecricity bills, and using charcoal and fire wood in ways they over consume leading to wastage of resources , this calls for new modern ways of providing energy by use of energy saving stoves from KESSO co ltd , we hope to camb down resource wastage.

Our Achievements

We have fabricated over 430 energy saving stoves (Steel215 and Clay215). The Company has a nursery bed of tree seedlings and a main garden of 1 acre where they have planted. We are looking for possible ways of increasing this project because it benefits the environment more. We have managed to open up offices in Kampala and Kihihi where we operate from .

A Better Life For Every One

The project will benefit 3,000,000 female and 2,000,000 male Ugandans. This is the design planned because the project desires to respond to the financial needs of females owing to the fact they struggle more to get financial empowerment compared to males. They must be 18-55years of age and in marriage or single mother or single fathers with a certain level of responsibility that enables the target beneficiary to benefit more people in the household. They should be having the desire to raise income from energy saving stove enterprises or ready to reduce use of charcoal or wood. This will work best for households living in areas with little firewood

Our Target

Our Strategic Objective is to have at least 10,000 Ugandan households supportedwith energy saving stoves by December 2022.

OUTCOMES

At the end of the Project, we shall have at least 5,000,000 Ugandans trained in energy saving technologies, among which100,000 households will be having energy saving stoves constructed for them, 10,000 joined the company as shareholders. The company expects to install more 2,000,000 stoves in various homes at a profit to benefit more Ugandans who are able to buy and install stoves

background

Kihihi Energy Saving Stoves Company was formed under the sole discretion of Mr. Masiko Lawrence who laiter, discussed this development idea with Tuheisomwe Jackline and Mugisha Denis and They crystallized their thoughts and plans to form a company that serves both Uganda and other countries
